trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for routing the workflow instance ID to and from a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowWebService"></xref> to a cookie in the Web client.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um mecanismo para encaminhar o ID de instância de fluxo de trabalho de e para um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowWebService"> </xref> para um cookie no cliente do Web.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This functionality is required to reenter a workflow definition that is exposed as a Web service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Esta funcionalidade é necessário reintroduzir uma definição de fluxo de trabalho que está exposta como um serviço Web.

trans-unit.source: Without this module, the first call to the workflow-exposed Web service works, but subsequent calls fail.
trans-unit.target: Sem este módulo, primeira chamada para o serviço de Web expostas de fluxo de trabalho funciona, mas as chamadas subsequentes falharem.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, make sure that the client application has cookies enabled.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de que a aplicação de cliente tem cookies ativados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule"></xref>.
Call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A>Quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> occupied.
trans-unit.target: Após a chamada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A>, tem de libertar todas as referências ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>ocupado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada `Dispose` antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não são libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the workflow Web hosting module and prepares the module to handle requests.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o módulo de alojamento de Web de fluxo de trabalho e prepara o módulo para processar pedidos.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A> to register event handling methods with specific events.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A>para registar métodos com eventos específicos de processamento de eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowWebHostingModule.System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> que fornece acesso aos métodos, propriedades e eventos comuns a todos os objetos de aplicação dentro de uma aplicação ASP.NET.
